body.p: I write you request an official favor for a friend of mine in Denver City Colorado Territory.
It is that you will appoint M A. O McGrew Commissioner for Ky to take acknowledgments of Deeds &c for the Territory of Colorado.
Mr McGrew is desirous of this appointment and I am satisfied of his fitness to discharge its duties well, pleasend to my address Denver City at your earliest convenience.

I leave here in a few days for Colorado. and should
again be a candidate for congress. whether the Republicans will hat me time will tell, but Il give them a good fight.
Any sudgestions from you would be thankfully recd.
Accept me well wishes for your speedy recov from the accident which you lately met with and believe me as ever your friend

Colorado Ter.
Comr of Deeds
A. O. McGrew
Denver City
Enclose Comission to ^Hon.^ B. D Williams of Danville, Care M. J. Dunham Esq
